article_title: Koch-funded argument exactly why we need ACA

article_metadata.description: March 12 — To the Editor:The article by Nathan Nascimento, director of the State Initiatives at "Freedom Partners Chamber of Commerce" (printed March 11) offers perfect example as to why the Affordable Care Act was built.Anyone who understands the concept of any kind of insurance, knows that the urge to offer special deals to sub classes of those who ask for insurance is only possible by restricting the riskier sub-classes. Teen drivers in car insurance for
